name: Super Defender Box
description:
Updated! but not finished yet. More updates will follow!

There is no gameover, level, or scoring system yet, just shoot around. And enjoy the new retro wave style menu ;)

%75 of the game is developed on the bus, so its very unfinished. I will update it later. Don't forget to check back!

Controls:

All you need is Left-Right navigation buttons and shoot button. ("X" on keyboard).
